name: RadioBrowser
0:
”Alexa, open radio browser”
”Alexa tell radio browser number two”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio browser
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Station list provided by free Community Radio Browser.
Choose stations from a database of 27 000 entries. Listen to Internet radio in many languages, from many countries. Choose by genre, vote or keyword.
Create your own favorites list on https://radiobrowser.esp8266-server.de


Operation:
Launch
"Alexa start radio browser", "Alexa radio browser", "Alexa open radio browser"

Navigate forward and backward in the list (zapping)
"Alexa next", "Alexa previous"

Switch to station 1
"Alexa restart", "Alexa start again"

Select station via number 
"Alexa tell radio browser number 3"
"Alexa ask radio browser for number 3"

After activating the skill, a sample favorites list is created for you with 100 entries. To edit the favorites list visit 
https://radiobrowser.esp8266-server.de

The free version offers the option of using 3 radio stations.
Unlimited station list can be subscribed to.
You can order an unlimited station list by saying: "Alexa, ask radio browser what can I buy".

On the web page of the developer privacy policy is a link to the home page of the skill and the contact form. Through the contact form you can easily send me your ideas, suggestions and constructive criticism.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
